title: Andersonville National Historic Site: Volunteer
body: Volunteer         Volunteers are instrumental in assisting park staff and visitors. NPS/Andersonville National Historic Site  Andersonville National Historic Site offers a variety of volunteer opportunities including visitor services, living history, cemetery stewardship, resource management, and research. The park offers housing opportunities through RV hook-up spaces and a studio apartment for longer-term volunteers. For more information about opportunities to volunteer, contact the Volunteer Coordinator at 229 924-0343 or send us an e-mail.
